author: NFT-DAO (the whole team)
title: NFTDAO: Industry Standards 1 (dues)
description: Mainstream adoption of NFTs require standards to give organizations confidence in their long term stability and consistency.
solution: Industry Standards Organizations develop standards for adoption across multiple vendor implementations, these are starting to form for NFTs.
experience: NFTDAO has over 300 contributors with differing specialities, including architects who have developed & adopted various technical standards.
